items.sentence: When did you find out that Tom wanted to do that?
When did you find out that Tom was still married?
When did you have your last physical examination?
When my mother was young, she was very beautiful.
I don\'t believe we\'ve been formally introduced.
I don\'t care that Tom isn\'t having a good time.
Tom was lying unconscious on the operating table.
Tom was probably the shortest person in the room.
Tom was quite concerned about what was happening.
Tom was transferred to the head office in Boston.
